name: NOISULLA ACT-1
description:
Hello, and thanks for playing my visual novel!

Let me get to the point. The backgrounds for Kunkun's
bedroom have not been credited yet. I was unable to
find the artist because the site i got it from has
been taken down. Reason being that it was inactive
for a year. But that is just what I've heard.
If you are the artist, then please reach out to me
by sending a message on itch.io or if you know the
artist then please message me as well.My account
name is MegaSaberEXE. After i have evidence that
you are the real artist, then i will credit you as
soon as possible. Also the sunset has not
been credited either.

UPDATED: I just found the artist for kunkun's room, his or her name is lesleigh63. I will add their name to the list and game as soon as possible.

Warning:Bad cliches, Bad plot, Bad puns, and old memes

P.S. The sound for this game has been set very high,
so if your wearing earphones please make sure to low
the volume a lot and then proceed to rise it higher
to your preferred settings.

P.S. Change the text speed to 1/6 to get scrolling
text

P.S. Sorry for any bad grammar, sentence structure, etc

P.S. 3 Endings

P.S. Using the Ren'py engine

Here is the website i got the assets from:
http://renpyhandbook.tumblr.com/free-vn-assets\

Music and sounds from freesounds.org
